ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities in the osu-wiki repository include fixes for duplicate wording on holiday newsposts, addition of lazer mod articles, and updates to various mod fields and descriptions, with multiple pull requests and push events occurring on December 24th and 25th.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository saw a push event on December 25th, implementing the ability to mark a beatmap as played through a merged pull request.

ppy/helm-charts.summary: The helm-charts repository had a push event on December 24th, updating the index.yaml file with a signed-off commit from ThePooN.
